response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique blend of innovation and quality that we believe could significantly enhance your life or business. We understand that its true value might be subjective, but considering its craftsmanship, features, and potential impact, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that not only adds value to your collection but also represents a significant investment in quality and prestige. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
